title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending multiple lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn for each line added.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should only be one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the application with StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times instead of only once per visible line.
